DOC.HEADLINE: RECORD RACK : IN BRIEF
DOC.TEXT: Queensryche , " Promised Land , " EMI * * * . Edgy , brooding , grand sonic gestures and gusts of harmonies continue to sweep_over Queensryche ' s hard-rock terrain.But in the two years since their last album , they ' ve tempered their songs , revealing some subtle new dynamics . " Promised Land " covers much territory , from stretches of introspection and social commentary to quiet acoustic moments and epic compositions . New albums are rated on a scale of one star ( poor ) , two stars ( fair ) , three stars ( good ) and four stars ( excellent ) . Sandy Masuo
